SEARCH
Package view.overlays.menuOverlays

Class MenuOverlayView

java.lang.Object
view.overlays.menuOverlays.MenuOverlayView
Direct Known Subclasses:
MenuScoreBoardOverlayView, MenuUserCreationOverlayView, MenuUserSelectionOverlayView
public abstract class MenuOverlayView extends Object
The MenuOverlayView class is an abstract class that view of the MenuOverlayModel class. It provides the fonts used for drawing the menu overlay.
